entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
